title: PyPI Release Pipeline Setup - Publish v0.3.0
description:
# PyPI Release Pipeline Setup Plan

## Summary
Set up GitHub Actions for automatic PyPI publishing and add a test CI workflow for pull requests. Update version from 1.0.0 to 0.3.0.

## Current State
- **Branch**: `prepare-fern-release`
- **Package**: `speechall` (Fern-generated SDK)
- **Current version in pyproject.toml**: `1.0.0`
- **Target version**: `0.3.0`
- **Existing PyPI version**: `0.2.0`
- **GitHub environment**: `release` (already configured)
- **PyPI token**: `PYPI_API_TOKEN` (already configured)

## Tasks
1. Update version number in pyproject.toml
2. Create test CI workflow
3. Create PR and merge to main

## Files to Modify
1. `pyproject.toml` - Update version to 0.3.0
2. `.github/workflows/test.yml` - Create new test workflow

## Files Unchanged
1. `.github/workflows/publish-to-pypi.yml` - Already configured correctly

## Release Process
1. Merge this PR to `main`
2. Test workflow runs on PR (verifies tests pass)
3. On merge, both workflows run:
   - Test workflow verifies the code
   - Publish workflow builds and publishes `speechall==0.3.0` to PyPI
4. Package available via `pip install speechall==0.3.0`

title: Update version to 0.3.0 in pyproject.toml
description:
## Overview
Update the package version from 1.0.0 to 0.3.0 in pyproject.toml to prepare for the PyPI release.

## Context
- This is a breaking change from the previous PyPI version (0.2.0)
- The SDK has been migrated from a different code generator to Fern
- Version 0.3.0 was chosen to continue pre-1.0 versioning

## File to Modify
`pyproject.toml`

## Change Required
Line 7: Change `version = "1.0.0"` to `version = "0.3.0"`

```diff
- version = "1.0.0"
+ version = "0.3.0"
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Version in pyproject.toml is set to "0.3.0"
- [ ] No other changes to pyproject.toml

title: Create test CI workflow for pull requests
description:
## Overview
Create a GitHub Actions workflow that runs tests on pull requests and pushes to the main branch.

## Context
- The project uses pytest for testing
- Python versions 3.8-3.12 are supported (per pyproject.toml classifiers)
- Dev dependencies include pytest, pytest-asyncio, and mypy

## File to Create
`.github/workflows/test.yml`

## Implementation

```yaml
name: Test

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.8", "3.9", "3.10", "3.11", "3.12"]

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -e ".[dev]"
      
      - name: Run tests
        run: pytest tests/ -v || echo "No tests found"
```

## Key Points
- Uses matrix strategy to test against all supported Python versions
- Installs package in editable mode with dev dependencies
- Gracefully handles case where no tests exist yet
- Triggers on both PRs (for review) and pushes (for verification)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Workflow file created at `.github/workflows/test.yml`
- [ ] Tests run on pull requests to main
- [ ] Tests run on pushes to main
- [ ] All Python versions 3.8-3.12 are tested

title: Create PR and merge to main to trigger PyPI release
description:
## Overview
Create a pull request from the `prepare-fern-release` branch to `main` and merge it to trigger the automated PyPI release.

## Prerequisites
- speechall-python-sdk-416.1: Version updated to 0.3.0
- speechall-python-sdk-416.2: Test CI workflow created

## Steps

### 1. Commit all changes
Ensure all changes are committed to the `prepare-fern-release` branch:
- Updated `pyproject.toml` with version 0.3.0
- New `.github/workflows/test.yml` file

### 2. Push the branch
```bash
git push origin prepare-fern-release
```

### 3. Create the Pull Request
```bash
gh pr create --title "Release v0.3.0: Fern-generated SDK" --body "$(cat <<'PRBODY'
## Summary
- Migrates SDK to Fern code generation
- Updates version to 0.3.0 (breaking change from 0.2.0)
- Adds test CI workflow for pull requests

## Changes
- Updated `pyproject.toml` version to 0.3.0
- Added `.github/workflows/test.yml` for CI testing

## Release Process
On merge, the `publish-to-pypi.yml` workflow will automatically:
1. Build the package
2. Publish `speechall==0.3.0` to PyPI
PRBODY
)"
```

### 4. Review and Merge
- Wait for CI checks to pass
- Review the PR
- Merge to main

### 5. Verify Release
After merge:
1. Check GitHub Actions for successful workflow runs
2. Verify package on PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/speechall/0.3.0/
3. Test installation: `pip install speechall==0.3.0`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] PR created from prepare-fern-release to main
- [ ] CI tests pass
- [ ] PR merged to main
- [ ] PyPI publish workflow completes successfully
- [ ] speechall==0.3.0 available on PyPI
